title: Border images: Albury-Wodonga 1920s-1970s
creator_credit: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: Recapture the essence of Albury-Wodonga, the twin border cities on the Murray River. Delight in the landscapes of the past, recall the unique growth and progress of these twin cities: Hume Weir construction ; the intrigue of the Pyjama Murder mystery, travel on the Spirit of Progresses inaugural journey ; race in the 1930 Albury Gold Cup ; fly the Centenary Air Race with Bert Hinkler ; laugh with the old times of Albury-Wodonga and follow the frolicking fun of days gone by.
creator_credit_for_label: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
